description: The humor lies in the clever use of 'Scharfe' wit and glühwein to break ice, metaphorically and literally.
title: Icy Encounter
n_1: On a chilly Berlin morning, Hans and Franz stare at a frozen lake.
c2_1: Wait until you see my secret weapon.
n_2: Franz reveals a bottle of glühwein, and both smirk knowingly.
c2_2: And the sharpness of wit to use it.
n_3: They share the glühwein, laughing, as the ice begins to crack.
c1_3: Who knew glühwein could cut ice?
n_4: With a warm chuckle, they walk over the now safe path, bonded by wit and wine.
c2_4: The best way to break the ice.
